parameters.name: anomaly_window_size
parameters.description: Size of the anomalous pattern; sliding windows for clustering and preprocessing are of size 3*anomaly_window_size.

parameters.name: n_clusters
parameters.description: Number of clusters used in Kshape that are maintained iteratively as a normal model

parameters.name: n_init_train
parameters.description: Number of points to build the initial model (may contain anomalies)

parameters.name: iter_batch_size
parameters.description: Number of points for each batch. Mostly impacts performance (not too small).

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Weight decay / forgetting factor. Quite robust

parameters.name: use_column_index
parameters.description: The column index to use as input for the univariate algorithm for multivariate datasets. The selected single channel of the multivariate time series is analyzed by the algorithms. The index is 0-based and does not include the index-column ('timestamp'). The single channel of an univariate dataset, therefore, has index 0.
